about_the_game:
Game Features:
1.Strategic synthesis and upgrade methods that immerse you in mental calculations.
2.Combine three identical patterns to synthesize and collect resources.
3.Sandbox-style free play, creating unlimited possibilities.

Gameplay:
1.Synthesis rules: Combine three or more of the same type and level to construct advanced buildings.
2.Synthesizing more than three towers for upgrades yields stronger attack rewards.
3.Monsters invade at night; players should synthesize and eliminate them as much as possible, acquiring weapons and items to strengthen defenses.

Game Items:
1.Treasure: Acquire a weapon.
2.Bomb: Deals direct damage to enemies.
3.Health Potion: Restores health points.

Enemy Introduction:
1.Melee Monster: Balanced in health and speed.
2.Ranged Monster: Long attack distance but low health.
3.Mage Monster: Magic attacks with significant damage.

Boss: Terrifying health. A nightmare for new players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8GHz / AMD Athlon 2600+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: C'97 compatible stereo sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6600 / Athlon X2 4600+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio compatible stereo sound card
